name: Dinner Tonight: Duck Breast With Curry Seasoning
description: I don't have much experience with duck. I usually save my experiences for restaurants which have the time to properly cook them. Most duck breast recipes call for a long marinade--something I often can't fit in my schedule. But this...

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle the duck with the curry powder and a little bit of salt and pepper.
Place in the broiler, skin up, for about 8 minutes. Flip and cook for another 2 to 3 minutes. Let rest for 5 minutes before cutting up.
